entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 8:01 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:01 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023
